name: bulbasaur
shortDescription: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

name: ivysaur
shortDescription: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: venusaur
shortDescription: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: charmander
shortDescription: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmeleon
shortDescription: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: charizard
shortDescription: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: squirtle
shortDescription: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: wartortle
shortDescription: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: blastoise
shortDescription: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: caterpie
shortDescription: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: metapod
shortDescription: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: butterfree
shortDescription: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: weedle
shortDescription: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: kakuna
shortDescription: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: beedrill
shortDescription: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: pidgey
shortDescription: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: pidgeotto
shortDescription: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: pidgeot
shortDescription: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: rattata
shortDescription: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: raticate
shortDescription: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: spearow
shortDescription: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

name: fearow
shortDescription: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: ekans
shortDescription: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: arbok
shortDescription: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: pikachu
shortDescription: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: raichu
shortDescription: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: sandshrew
shortDescription: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: sandslash
shortDescription: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: nidoran-f
shortDescription: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: nidorina
shortDescription: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: nidoqueen
shortDescription: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: nidoran-m
shortDescription: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: nidorino
shortDescription: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: nidoking
shortDescription: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

name: clefairy
shortDescription: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: clefable
shortDescription: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: vulpix
shortDescription: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: ninetales
shortDescription: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: jigglypuff
shortDescription: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: wigglytuff
shortDescription: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: zubat
shortDescription: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: golbat
shortDescription: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: oddish
shortDescription: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: gloom
shortDescription: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: vileplume
shortDescription: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: paras
shortDescription: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

name: parasect
shortDescription: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: venonat
shortDescription: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

name: venomoth
shortDescription: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: diglett
shortDescription: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: dugtrio
shortDescription: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: meowth
shortDescription: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

name: persian
shortDescription: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: psyduck
shortDescription: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

name: golduck
shortDescription: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: mankey
shortDescription: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: primeape
shortDescription: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: growlithe
shortDescription: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: arcanine
shortDescription: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: poliwag
shortDescription: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: poliwhirl
shortDescription: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: poliwrath
shortDescription: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: abra
shortDescription: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

name: kadabra
shortDescription: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

name: alakazam
shortDescription: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: machop
shortDescription: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: machoke
shortDescription: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: machamp
shortDescription: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: bellsprout
shortDescription: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

name: weepinbell
shortDescription: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: victreebel
shortDescription: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: tentacool
shortDescription: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: tentacruel
shortDescription: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: geodude
shortDescription: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: graveler
shortDescription: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: golem
shortDescription: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: ponyta
shortDescription: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: rapidash
shortDescription: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: slowpoke
shortDescription: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: slowbro
shortDescription: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

name: magnemite
shortDescription: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: magneton
shortDescription: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: farfetchd
shortDescription: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

name: doduo
shortDescription: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: dodrio
shortDescription: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: seel
shortDescription: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: dewgong
shortDescription: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: grimer
shortDescription: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: muk
shortDescription: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: shellder
shortDescription: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: cloyster
shortDescription: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: gastly
shortDescription: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: haunter
shortDescription: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

name: gengar
shortDescription: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: onix
shortDescription: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

name: drowzee
shortDescription: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: hypno
shortDescription: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

name: krabby
shortDescription: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

name: kingler
shortDescription: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: voltorb
shortDescription: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

name: electrode
shortDescription: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: exeggcute
shortDescription: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: exeggutor
shortDescription: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

name: cubone
shortDescription: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

name: marowak
shortDescription: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: hitmonlee
shortDescription: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

name: hitmonchan
shortDescription: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: lickitung
shortDescription: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

name: koffing
shortDescription: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: weezing
shortDescription: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: rhyhorn
shortDescription: A POKéMON with a one-track mind. Once it charges,  it won't stop running until it falls asleep.

name: rhydon
shortDescription: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: chansey
shortDescription: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

name: tangela
shortDescription: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

name: kangaskhan
shortDescription: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

name: horsea
shortDescription: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: seadra
shortDescription: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: goldeen
shortDescription: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: seaking
shortDescription: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: staryu
shortDescription: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

name: starmie
shortDescription: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: mr-mime
shortDescription: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

name: scyther
shortDescription: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: jynx
shortDescription: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: electabuzz
shortDescription: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: magmar
shortDescription: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

name: pinsir
shortDescription: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

name: tauros
shortDescription: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: magikarp
shortDescription: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: gyarados
shortDescription: Once it begins to rampage, a GYARADOS will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

name: lapras
shortDescription: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

name: ditto
shortDescription: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

name: eevee
shortDescription: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

name: vaporeon
shortDescription: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

name: jolteon
shortDescription: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

name: flareon
shortDescription: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

name: porygon
shortDescription: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: omanyte
shortDescription: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

name: omastar
shortDescription: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

name: kabuto
shortDescription: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

name: kabutops
shortDescription: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: aerodactyl
shortDescription: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

name: snorlax
shortDescription: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: articuno
shortDescription: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: zapdos
shortDescription: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: moltres
shortDescription: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

name: dratini
shortDescription: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: dragonair
shortDescription: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: dragonite
shortDescription: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

name: mewtwo
shortDescription: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

name: mew
shortDescription: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
